data.heading: Powered By Your Potential
data.paragraph: Spectrum Reach is the marketing platform of choice to help your business reach new heights, without breaking your budget.

steps.label: Scale
steps.heading: Scale that works for you
steps.paragraph: Whether you want to reach over 27 million households or just the homes within two miles of your business, we have you covered. We’re talking 41 states and 100+DMAs.

steps.label: Focus
steps.heading: Focus on where you need to be
steps.paragraph: If your business is invested in only one part of the country, narrow your target for a wiser spend.

steps.label: Aim
steps.heading: Aim for a smaller target
steps.paragraph: Your business only serves one market area. This is so easy.

steps.label: Where
steps.heading: Where you are is where it’s at
steps.paragraph: This is your zone, your town, your neighbourhood. Get ready with a smile because your customers are going to be dropping by.

data.heading:
Our Platform is
Our Promise to You
data.paragraph: Combined with our national scale and resources, only we can deliver:

steps.heading: Zero-in-ability
steps.paragraph: Target the right audience on TV
steps.secondaryParagraph: Spend with precision by targeting the right television audiences in over 27 million households or just the homes within two miles of your business.

steps.heading: Feet on your Street
steps.paragraph: Partner with an expert local team
steps.secondaryParagraph: Partner with a dedicated team of experts that live and work in your local community.

steps.heading: The Top 50+
steps.paragraph: Align your brand with top programming
steps.secondaryParagraph: Share the stage and align your brand with over 400 of the most-watched and most-loved programs across 50+ networks.

steps.heading: Super Screens
steps.paragraph: Engage your audience on every screen
steps.secondaryParagraph: Engage your audience using the most innovative ad technology on TV, online, mobile, social, and search.

steps.heading: The Works
steps.paragraph: Engage your audience on every screen
steps.secondaryParagraph: Develop a memorable, effective campaign with our best-in-class sales, planning, reporting, and creative.

callToActions.heading: Television
callToActions.paragraph: The foundation of a solid brand is built on TV, the most powerful video platform ever created.

callToActions.heading: Digital
callToActions.paragraph: Extend your campaign and make your message stronger across every screen, everywhere your customers are, no matter what.

callToActions.heading:
Creative
Services
callToActions.paragraph: Your brand’s story deserves to be told by award-winning storytellers – and we have them. If your message isn’t right on point, you’re just wasting your energy.

personas.heading: Local
personas.paragraph: Your mission: to make your idea happen. No industry jargon, just the best solutions to hit consumers with all you’ve got.

personas.heading: National
personas.paragraph: Your mission is to find innovative ideas that connect with customers all across the country. You have the pulse on what they want and the competition. We have the resources to help you win.

personas.heading: Agencies
personas.paragraph: You confidently take your clients through new marketing platforms and schedules that simply blow their minds. There’s a lot at stake. That’s why we have the top-tier programming on the networks that move the needle.

personas.heading: Automotive
personas.paragraph: Potential car buyers should have a clear sense of what sets you apart from your competition. Our automotive specialists can equip you with the products, tools and insights that drive traffic to your dealership and help you sell more.
